description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Cooperate with Board of Directors and Design Department to select collection for each season before mass production.
              
              - Monitor and ensure to have sample before deadline according to production plan of company.
              
              - Monitor the pattern making process of factories and ensure factories receive proper pattern with right measurement charts of the samples.
              
              - Calculate and control consumption rate as well as upgrade jump for new samples.
              
              - Provide consumption rate to Production Department.
              
              - Inspect the measurement and technical details between test sample and pattern.
              
              - Be in charge of accuracy of consumption rate, pattern, test sample, etc. for all collections of company (menswear).
              
              - Cooperate with Quality Control Agent of company and the factories to provide best solutions for issues relating to technical standards of products.
              
              - Manage and assign works to pattern makers, sample makers, etc.
              
              - Instruct and support subordinates to complete objectives of Technical Department.
              
              - Check and confirm product quality as factories deliver their products to company’s warehouse.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Local Vietnamese Only
              

              - Bachelor in Textile/Fashion Design education.
              
              - Experience from 05 years or above.
              
              - A proven track record and knowledge of garment construction in menswear multi-products.
              
              - A proven track record in a similar role.
              
              - Excellent team player with good communication skills.
              
              - Flexibility and show initiative.
              
              - Attention to detail and deadline management.
              
              - Passion for the Routine brand
              
              - Prepared to travel if and when required
              
              - Good communication in English (both oral and written).
              

              Salary:		Negotiable
              

              Benefits:
              
              - Social Security policies as regulations.
              
              - Extra Personal Healthcare as company policy.
              
              - Lunch allowance, laptop provided.
              
              - 13th month salary and extra bonus based on company and personal KPIs.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
